1) 128.1.6.5/12

IP:             10000000.00000001.00000110.00000101	128.1.6.5
Subnet mask:    11111111.11110000.00000000.00000000	255.240.0.0
IP Network:     10000000.00000000.00000000.00000000	128.0.0.0
IP Broadcast:   10000000.00001111.11111111.11111111	128.15.255.255
IP Min:         10000000.00000000.00000000.00000001	128.0.0.1
IP Max:         10000000.00001111.11111111.11111110	128.15.255.254
Numero di host: 2^(32-12)-2 = 2^20-2 = 1,048,576-2 = 	1.048.574 Host

IP Min:         11001000.00000001.00000010.00000001	200.1.2.1
IP Max:         11001000.00000001.00000010.11111110	200.1.1.254
Numero di host: 2^(32-24)-2 = 2^8-2 = 256-2 = 		254 Host

IP Max:         11000000.11000000.00000011.11111110	192.192.3.254

6) 172.16.0.4/16
